# Basic Azure DevOps Security Role Assignment Fixture

This fixture demonstrates a minimal security role assignment for tests.

## Features

- Assigns a single role to a single identity

## Key Configuration

This fixture keeps inputs explicit to reduce test runtime.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
